text: Heras fence in Lordship Recreation Ground, Haringey, London Heras Fence Base Block Heras fencing is a brand of temporary fencing intended for use on construction sites. It consists of individual panels approximately wide and tall. Each panel consists of a metal tubing frame, with feet slotted into concrete or synthetic blocks. In the middle of the panel is a metal mesh. Heras Fencing is produced by Heras Mobile Fencing & Security, who first developed their temporary fencing in 1966. ==References== Category:Fences Category:Perimeter security
title: Heras fencing
